descriptions:
['DescriptionExclusive Links Real Estate Brokers is proud to offer to the Dubai Real Estate market, these amazing 4BR + maids townhouses in the ninth and final village of the sought after Victory Heights project, due to handover in Q4 2020.
Offered on attractive payment plans over 5, 7, or 9 years, the properties will offer 2680 sqft of living space, arranged over 3 levels and are currently offered with 0% DLD Fees and Agency Fee.
The properties will feature 3 BR (en-suite to master) and a family bathroom on the 1st floor, with a ground floor comprising of a 4th bed, shower room, fitted kitchen with appliances and a living/dining room leading out to the rear garden. Completing the accommodation is a 2nd floor with maids room and laundry.
To the front of the property is a carport offering parking for 2 vehicles.
Located opposite Esmeralda, close to the Al Fay exit, Marbella Village will feature a dedicated community centre with leisure facilities, a supermarket and other retail outlets.
For more info and to arrange a viewing please contact: Fintan +971561159044 fintan@exclusive-links.com']

['Description1 Bed in the 4 star branded residences.

For more info please call +971555763234
Offering Riviera-style living in a modern aesthetic setting, Dubai Marina by Emaar is one of the first and largest of its kind waterfront developments in the region. With a total development area of 50 million sq ft, Dubai Marina has a large canal spanning 3.5 km offering access to the sea from both ends.
Dubai Marina features several high-rises with luxury apartments as well as villas set against the backdrop of the Marina. With yachts moored along the Marina and some of the city’s best dining, entertainment and leisure facilities, Dubai Marina is the first choice for the stylish and sophisticated.
Dubai Marina comprises ten districts each developed as a distinct community. The Dubai Marina Walk, which lines the waterfront, has a selection of cosmopolitan restaurants............................................................................................................']
